      • random

        public static java.util.Random random()
        Returns an instance of Random. This reduces the use of needing to create new random instances all the time.
        Returns:
        an instance of java.util.Random

      • chance

        public static boolean chance​(double percent)
        Gives boolean with the chance. If the chance rolls lower than percent then it will it will be true. Percent values range from 0 to 1.
        Parameters:
        percent - a percent between 0 and 1.
        Returns:
        true if the roll was within the percentage.

      • chance

        public static boolean chance​(int range)
        Gives boolean from a random chance.
        Parameters:
        range - a percent between 0 and 1.
        Returns:
        true if the roll was within the percentage.

      • fix

        public static float fix​(float v,
                        float fix)
        Fixes a float value if it is invalid.
        Parameters:
        v - value to fix.
        fix - fixed default value to use if v is invalid.
        Returns:
        returns v if the value is valid otherwise returns fix if the value is NaN or Infinite.
